message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is really the lowest I can go. I know it's a great product that will benefit you. How about we meet in the middle at $17,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm glad you're willing to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not able to exceed $15,000 for this product. Could we perhaps find a mutual agreement at $15,000?
